text: When Nasrudin's donkey fell ill, the mule broke down in tears. Why are you crying? His neighbor asked him. The poor animal is still alive. But if he dies, I'll have to bury him, then I'll have to save for a new donkey, then I'll have to go to the donkey auction, and then I'll have to tame the replacement. I won't have time to grieve. FIN
title: El asno enfermo
author: nan Anónimo
